message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can work out a better deal later if we want.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take it or let's see what happens to the value of our shares.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 55/45 split is more fair. Let's avoid further devaluation and settle this now.
Alice, time is running out!  I'm holding firm at 65/35.  You're losing more each round by being stubborn.
I'm still holding out for a more equitable split, but I'm willing to budge a bit more. 45/55 is my final offer. Let's not let this valuable money disappear.
